revised_title: Preservation of Fish and Flesh in Lime-Water
tldr: The author, Francis Hume, conducted experiments to determine the effectiveness of lime-water in preserving fish and flesh. He found that lime-water effectively preserved fish but not flesh. This discovery contradicted previous experiments by Dr. Alston and Dr. Pringle, leading to further investigation and confirmation of the results.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Food Science
